heading: HB06252
0: AN ACT DECLARING THE 31ST DAY OF JULY OF EVERY YEAR AS A SPECIAL NON-WORKING PUBLIC HOLIDAY OF THE MUNICIPALITY OF TANGALAN, PROVINCE OF AKLAN TO BE KNOWN AS "TANGALAN DAY" IN CELEBRATION OF ITS SEPARATION FROM THE MUNICIPALITY OF MAKATO, AKLAN AND IN COMMEMORATION OF THE HEROES OF VIVO REVOLT
